text:
@DrDenaGrayson How funny that people can hardly blame China for Covid-19 now as Spain found the virus back to 2019 March sewer sample, and now found a new idea of blame China with potential new virus!
Why don't you guys say the same thing when America has "mythic pheumonia" last year???
